member.summary: Adds a ThemeSection to the ThemeSections list.

member.summary: Removes a ThemeSection from the ThemeSections list.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Domain.Entities.Theme.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor

member.name: M:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Domain.Entities.Theme.Merge(Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Domain.Entities.Theme)
member.summary:
Merge the theme rule values of the specified source theme to this theme (the target theme).
If a rule exists in both themes, source version is saved.
If a rule exists only in source theme, it is removed.
If a rule exists only in target theme, it is added.
If a rule exists in both themes, but source's value is null, target value is applied.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Web.Mvc.Domain.Entities.Theme.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the theme's name.

member.summary: Gets the list of ThemeSections.
